text:
Mrs. Gertrudes G. Broderick
—A.—
October 31, 1949
should be happy to see that 50 or sore copies of this program are supplied
to you weekly, or if you preferred, we could mail it direct to the addresses
which you may furnish.
Again, may I thank you sincerely for your great interest, and I look forward
to your valuable help in the future.
Sincerely yours,
WILLARD C. VICHERS
enc,
cc. Mr. H. Emory* Ellis
Mr. Richard B. Hull
